keyPolicies.policyDescription: A change that works for you with clean, open, fair policies.

mentions.candidate: I am committed to work hard on your behalf to address these concerns.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: For sixty five years there has been either a Labour or Conservative Government to get us into this mess, and with both Tories and Labour stuck in the last century, it is time to change.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The 'Filton and Bradley Stoke' constituency is a new one, so there is no record from last time to predict how the vote might turn out; experts say that it is a close '3-way marginal', which means that any of the three main parties can win.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am aware that there are issues that worry people in this area, such as local transport and the traffic on the Ring Road.

contactInformation.address: Crossing House, Green Lane, Severn Beach.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet image for Peter Tyzack, Liberal Democrat Candidate.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Hilary Kitchen on behalf of Peter Tyzack (Liberal Democrats) at Crossings House, Green Lane, Severn Beach. Printed by Ensign Print, High St, Chipping Sodbury.
